title: Gap over the summer vs no name internship?
embed_text:
Gap over the summer vs no name internship? - I know this does come off as unaware, but my situation is kind of different right now for this to work.

I’ve had multiple internships(3) in the past year and last summer at good name companies (f50s), but this company for this summer is basically a downgrade from what I had previously in terms of both work, prestige and pay. Should I do it or prioritize interview prep and some classes? Or would it look bad on my resume?

I know it’s my fault for not being prepped for interviews better this year, but I really feel like I was just underprepared for this season and couldn’t make the most of it at all.
description:
I know this does come off as unaware, but my situation is kind of different right now for this to work.

I’ve had multiple internships(3) in the past year and last summer at good name companies (f50s), but this company for this summer is basically a downgrade from what I had previously in terms of both work, prestige and pay. Should I do it or prioritize interview prep and some classes? Or would it look bad on my resume?

I know it’s my fault for not being prepped for interviews better this year, but I really feel like I was just underprepared for this season and couldn’t make the most of it at all.

title: Tesla Recalls Its Semi Trucks Just Three Months After Release
embed_text: Tesla Recalls Its Semi Trucks Just Three Months After Release - Tesla is quickly becoming synonymous with \u201crecall,\u201d a word it has familiarized itself with after reporting glitches in thousands of its vehicles over the last several years. Now adding one more to its list, Tesla\u2019s Semi truck, which was announced six years before it was produced, is being voluntarily recalled due to\u2026Read more...

title: Which offer to accept?
